item.description: I will be sailing Sunday from the saltwater club in Hull on a Merit 25 at 11AM a bit early to get the heat of the day. I have room for 3 more. Itâ€™s just too late in the season for me to take novice sailors on a training run; I want experienced folk who have the proper training and attire for fall sailing. Hitting the RSVP button will not be enough to get you on this trip, I will be looking at your profile for qualifications and selecting accordingly. I will e mail you if your in. Normally I am happy to have a floating classroom, but the water is two cold now and other boats to render assistance are few on the high seas.
item.name: I will be sailing Sunday from the saltwater club in Hull on a Meritt 25
